features: 🎤『Automatic Pairing & Plug and Play』This innovative clip-on microphone is easier to use than other microphones. Step 1: Just plug the receiver into your iPhone/iPad device; Step 2: Turn on the power switch of the microphone, The two parts will pair automatically without adapters, extra apps and bluetooth.

🔥『Wireless Lavalier Microphone for Apple Android Computer』This smart wireless lavalier microphone set comes with 2 transmitters, perfect for recording videos of 2 people talking and interviewing. An additional Type-C to USB adapter makes it easy to connect the tiny cordless microphone to a PC computer or laptop. When using lav mic, you can charge your device at the same time, compatible with Android, Apple, PC computer or laptop.

🎤『Omnidirectional Sound & Noise Cancellation』With intelligent technology chip, 360°omnidirectional pickup mode. This lav microphone for iPhone built with a high-density anti-spray sponge and high-sensitivity microphone, to reduce wind noise and plosives, AI algorithm intelligent noise reduction module can accurately filter all kinds of noise to ensure you a quality sound and better experience.

🔥『Effective distance & long battery life』The upgraded wireless microphone is designed with 2.4GHz wireless transmission technology, 65ft barrier-free effective distance, you can move freely during video recording. Transmitter with built-in rechargeable battery, working time up to 6 hours.

🎤『Warm Tips & 1 Year Warranty』TPlease read the user manual and charge the wireless lavalier microphone before using it for the first time. Please feel free to contact us for further assistance, we provide 24 months warranty and 24 hours consult service. The package includes 1 x Wireless Microphones, 1 x Android Receiver, 1 x Store Case, 1 x Charging Cable, 1 x Type-C to USB Adaptor, 1 x Type-C to Lightning Adapter.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What system is this wireless microphone for? Does it work with Android/iphone phones and computers? This wireless microphone is suitable for Android phones Apple phones and computers can be used! Simply plug the corresponding port into a Type-c receiver for plug-and-play functionality. What is included in the box of this wireless microphone product? This wireless lavalier microphone set includes 2 lavalier microphones, 1 Type-c receiver and 1 iphone port 1 USB port, 1 mini storage case and works with a wide range of devices: including iPhone and Android phones and laptops. Why can I only record audio but not video using the microphone on some Android phones such as OPPO/Vivo/Oneplus? 1) If your phone has OTG function, please manually turn on OTG. 2) For OPPO/VIVO/Oneplus or some other Andriod phones, may need to set up manuallyas below: Settings > Sound & vibration > Other settings > Defaultrecorder > Use peripheral device. What if my phone cannot pair with the wireless microphone ? Please unplug and Insert the receiver and pair again.If you still cannot pair, please open your phone lock screen,unplug and Insert the receiver. Can I use the microphone while charging it at the same time? Yes, you can use the microphone while charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This item works very well for me. The sound quality was pretty impressive. It is a user friendly design and pretty easy to set it up. I kept it on, and the battery can hold for long enough for me to use at least a couple hours and still on it. So far no problem with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall Great Mics for price
reviews.reviewText: The compression rate is really high, but understandable seeing as how it is designed for phone usage. A little tin-y in the sound very heavy midrange but excellent for recording public speaking or presentations. Range is amazing, clarity is amazing, seems substantially durable, and comes with a cool case to house all the parts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for android phones or ipad device
reviews.reviewText: I was so happy to get this set of wireless lavalier microphones for my social videos. They are just simple plug and play, and super easy to work. I plugged the connector part into the charging port, and it fit just fine with my otterbox case still on. The clipped the mic to my shirt and pressed the power button on the mic. It turned blinking green, then red, then solid green for the connection indicator. Then I just recorded as usual. Even though I have a great internal mic in my S22 Ultra, I have the camera mounted on a tripod about 2 or 3 feet away, and I have really tall ceilings that absolutely swallow the sound or make it sound more distant. This brings the audience closer with less strain. It was recommended by another video blogger as a must have, with the 2nd one great for interviews or 2 people chatting together. It was definitely a great purchase choice for my needs, affordable, and I love how easy it was to just connect and record.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Get what you paid for
reviews.reviewText: It's super easy to set up and use. Your voice doesn't sound the best with these but I used SteelSeries Sonar to help with making it sound a tiny but better. I just needed a wireless microphone when in calls. I use a condenser mic otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024

reviews.reviewText: though the lights show it is recording moving around causes the audio to cut in and out.surprisingly light and has a decent quality otherwise.
